name: Wolfman's Cottage Weekend
description:
It's hard being a wolfman; everyone needs a vacation now and then. Take a load off and enjoy your cottage weekend!

Click and hold highlighted objects to pick them up. Hold them up to examine them.

Made for the Haunted PS1 Halloween Jam with Unity.
Sound made with sfxr.
Font by Eeve Somepx.
FPS controller adapted from Ben Esposito.
Additional sound by Fish LeBlanc.
